pullrequest.title: switch worldToReference transform from Pose to Quaternion. (Issue #1959 pull request #2339)

content.raw:
The numbers in `GAZEBO_DEPRECATED` are there only for our reference. The compiler will still treat this function as deprecated.

We shouldn't create new deprecations in a released version of gazebo. One version of Gazebo7 exists in debian, and this version will not be updated. Users would only see this deprecation if they start using the osrf packages. So, there will be a group of people who may miss this deprecation.

We could try to push in a new version of gazebo7 into debian, but this is difficult and risky.

You can deprecate this function in default.
content.html:
The numbers in GAZEBO_DEPRECATED are there only for our reference. The compiler will still treat this function as deprecated.

We shouldn't create new deprecations in a released version of gazebo. One version of Gazebo7 exists in debian, and this version will not be updated. Users would only see this deprecation if they start using the osrf packages. So, there will be a group of people who may miss this deprecation.

We could try to push in a new version of gazebo7 into debian, but this is difficult and risky.

You can deprecate this function in default.
